name: Suppurating Ooze
description: The Suppurating Ooze is a medium-sized, amorphous creature that appears as a mass of putrid slime, capable of moving through narrow spaces as small as 1 inch.
memorable: Its Seeping Death ability can inflict debilitating disease, potentially turning victims into more oozes.
goals: To infect living creatures and expand its own kind.
relations: Might be found in proximity to other oozes or creatures that thrive in decaying environments.
environment: Often located in dark, damp places conducive to decay, such as caves or sewers.
strengths: Immunities to poison and several conditions, along with strong Constitution saving throws.
weaknesses: Low Armor Class and low Dexterity makes it vulnerable to ranged attacks.
attacks: Can use a Pseudopod to deliver bludgeoning and necrotic damage with a chance to infect.
most_powerful_ability: Seeping Death, which can inflict a disease leading to reduced Dexterity and possible transformation into another ooze.
senses: Has blindsight of 60 feet, but is blind beyond this range.
additional_information: Can climb difficult surfaces, including ceilings.
Very low intelligence, making it simplistic in behavior.
Capable of causing significant ongoing damage through its disease.
Can spread its kind through infected creatures.
test_queries: necrotic damage ooze with high Constitution
